job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
We're hiring for a fast growing, Series A start-up, who have spun-off from a top-tier U.S University. Their leading AI product, is transforming the lives of patients and physicians, by re-imagining medical workflows with voice and machine learning.


Their product prepares medical charts, by listening to patient encounters, saving up to 3 hours a day for doctors. They're looking for a Senior NLP engineer to improve current machine learning models, working with the largest datasets of physician-patient encounters.


Why not join a team of top-tier university alumni, working with state-of-the-art machine learning, whilst revolutionizing healthcare?


You will:

  • Take ownership of the architecture of machine learning models
  • Build, iterate and deploy models
  • Work alongside leadership to define roadmaps, representing ML model architecture
  • Improve efficiency of the human-in-the-loop component
  • Work on a variety of NLP problems


You have:

  • Masters or above in Computer Science or related field
  • Experience deploying machine learning models into production
  • An interest in healthcare
  • Experience working with natural language processing
  • Expertise with Python and deep learning frameworks
  • The ability to work in a fast paced environment


Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.
